Firework I (EXP Boost) x5
Contains 5 Fireworks that will boost Character & Guild EXP gain for 2 hours.br>br>UI_R>This item will expire 3 days after it has been crafted./UI_R>
Firework II (Droprate Boost) x5
Contains 5 Fireworks that will boost Drop Rate & Rare Drop Rate for 2 hours.br>br>UI_R>This item will expire 3 days after it has been crafted./UI_R>
Firework III (Combat Stat Boost) x5
Contains 5 Fireworks that will boost several PVE and PVP combat stats for 2 hours.br>br>UI_R>This item will expire 3 days after it has been crafted./UI_R>
Firework I Recipe (EXP Boost)
Learn this to be able to craft Fireworks that will boost Character & Guild EXP gain.
Firework II Recipe (Droprate Boost)
Learn this to be able to craft Fireworks that will boost Drop Rate & Rare Drop Rate.
Firework III Recipe (Combat Stat Boost)
Learn this to be able to craft Fireworks that will boost several PVE and PVP combat stats.
Rune Golem Blueprints
Learn this to be able to craft a Rune Golem familiar according to Blueton.

Recipe: Stygea Supreme Ruler Weapon Skin (Guardian)
A recipe for a permanent, PvP-based weapon skin.br>Materials for this are obtained from very strong monsters and bosses in Stygaea.
